org.apache.james.mailbox.model

Class MessageRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.mailbox.model.MessageRange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Long>

    public class MessageRange
extends Object
implements Iterable<Long>
    Used to define a range of messages by uid.
    The type of the set should be defined by using an appropriate constructor.

      • range

        public static MessageRange range(long from,
                 long to)
        Constructs an inclusive ranges of messages. The parameters will be checked and from(long) used where appropriate.
        Parameters:
        from - first message UID
        to - last message UID
        Returns:
        not null

      • from

        Parameters:
        from - first message UID in range
        Returns:
        not null

      • split

        public List<MessageRange> split(int maxItems)
        Tries to split the given MessageRange to a List of MessageRange's which select only a max amount of items. This only work for MessageRange's with MessageRange.Type of MessageRange.Type.RANGE.
        Parameters:
        maxItems -
        Returns:
        ranges
